rules_text:
When Youmu enters, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
[i]Roukanken[/i] – Youmu has first strike as long as it's attacking.
[i]Hakurouken[/i] – Whenever you untap Youmu, exile target card in a graveyard. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
notes:
